entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] System.Linq.Expression.Tests.Expression_Tests.TestCallStaticMethodsByName - add rd.xml #69928
  • [API Proposal]: Add `.All` and `.Any()` for bool collections in System.Linq.Enumerable #69925
  • Way to get more detailed statistics about runtime unmanaged memory overhead? #69924
  • [6.0] HelloWorld singlefile app does not run on arm64 macos on SDK 6.0.203 or newer #69923
  • SqlBytes.Stream should consider overriding Span Read/Write methods #69921
  • [API Proposal]: Expose a high level authentication API #69920
    7.0.0
  • Developers can leverage Edit-and-Continue on Windows ARM64 #69907
    7.0.0
  • Delete `doesFieldBelongToClass` #69900
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add APIs for COSE signing #69896
    7.0.0
  • LoggerMessage generator generates invalid code for a parameter #69893
  • Consider caching Utf8JsonWriter and PooledByteBufferWriter on a thread static in JsonSerializer.Serialize #69889
  • ARM64 - Prepare for the future #69887
    .NET 7.0

Closed

  • Crossgen2 crashing on SPCL #69926
  • Mono Browser wasm Release failures on runtime rolling build #69850
  • [NativeAOT] Issue with expressing a Expression<Delegate> in a RD.xml file #69875
  • DateTime parsing on WebAssembly broken after trimming in latest .NET 7 main #69891
    7.0.0
  • `TypeLoadException` for `System.Runtime.Experimental` and .NET 7 Preview 4 #69903
  • Blazor WASM AoTing ClosedXML/DocumentFormat.OpenXml fails #69898
  • create-mibc with spgo on Linux #69607
    7.0.0
  • Implement Edit-And-Continue ICorDebug API's for ARM64 .NET Core #69904
    7.0.0
  • Regex Source Generator doesn't react when removing the attribute invocation causing it to break the design time build. #69880
  • JIT: inconsistent handling of GT_LCL_FLD in value numbering #12142
    Future
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) when calling Managed function using C# #69862
  • [wasm] Build libclang in dotnet/llvm-project for arm arch #65961
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Display parent's members on getProperties #68542
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    area-Single-File
  • [release/7.0-preview5][wasm] Backport fix for runtime test failures on CI #69929
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: allow pinvoke calli helper in TreatAsShouldHaveRetBufArg #69927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add hot/cold splitting test job to jit-runtime-experimental #69922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rooting `GT_COMMA` nodes for `GT_RETURN` nodes, then hoisting them to statements #69918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Pin thrown exceptions during EH. #69916
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android][test] Enable mandelbrot-7 on Android x64 with interp #69915
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][doc] Update Android NDK version to r23c #69913
    os-android
  • Remove more wprintf usages #69912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rev .NET 5 to net6.0 or $(NetCoreAppCurrent) #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Fix invocation of finally clauses with tiering enabled #69909
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • PoC: support custom X509ChainPolicy in SslStream #69908
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_STK` codegen #69905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Fix ICorDebugFunction2::GetVersionNumber for arm32. #69901
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bug fixes from dead code elimination #69897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete an old quirk from `gtSetEvalOrder` #69894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Convert MissingMemberException.FormatSignature to managed and shared #69890
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Explicitly include mscorlib.dll, to support scanning assemblies #69886
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Some cleanups in Native AOT suspension area #69885

Merged

  • Fix state buffer length in OdbcHandle.GetDiagnosticRecord #69914
    area-System.Data.Odbc
  • [wasm] Disable runtime test failing due to stack overflow #69863
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove CORCOMPILE_IMPORT_SECTION #69881
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] enable the promote feature. #69840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Do not recost and rethread trees inside `optRemoveRangeCheck` #69895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding analyzer/fixer for the Regex Source Generator (#68976) #69872
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Implement fake hot/cold splitting and corresponding stress mode #69763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • A few tweaks to regex source generator comments / naming for lookbehinds #69773
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Don't pin managed collection objects when the contents are non-blittable. #69696
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Cleanup a few more allocations in X.509 #69831
    area-System.Security
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Fix flags usage on Linux #69874
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Make `interp_to_native_signatures_count` static #69867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono

Updated

  • Pin char when UTF-16 marshalling is specified and runtime marshalling is disabled #69837
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: defer some flow graph reordering until after loop recognition #69878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Stream.ReadAtLeast perf regression in DataContractSerializer #69879
    area-Serialization
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Optimize better with maximum array length #69735
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Relax the address exposure condition in forward substitution #69818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.04 to libraries CI run #67345
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #69756
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Implement PemEncoding.WriteString #69877
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Fix diamond pattern encountered with static virtual interface methods #69738
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [MONO] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Convert Valuetype.FastEqualsCheck and GetHashCodeOfPtr to managed #69723
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement LoadLibraryErrorTracker #69842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Faster long->int overflow checks #69865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • Move off preview onto regular Windows 11 client images #69871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Provide the invalid value in the number parsing FormatException message #67415
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Process WebSocket connection errors on NodeJS #69858
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    community-contribution
  • [Draft] Fix hard link creation in tar tests in Android, iOS, tvOS #69416
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Or, And, Not + related fixes #69839
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
